mapper.select: SELECT EMNUM, NBO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE, IMPOR FROM ( SELECT EMNUM, NBO, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE, IMPOR , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NBO DESC) AS RNUM FROM BOARDTBL ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY NBO DESC
SELECT COUNT(NBO) FROM BOARDTBL WHERE NBO > 0
